revision.text: ==Features== ===Gym Auto-Rebattle=== Upon defeating a Gym for the 100th time the '''Gym Auto-Rebattle''' feature is unlocked. This allows gyms to be automatically restarted. However, each Gym fight using the Auto-Rebattle feature costs 2x the base cost (not including Achievement or Battle Item Bonuses) of the Gym and clearing the gym does not award any money.
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
